mutants.code:
def get_candy_position(n, r, c, candy):
    if candy >= n:
        return [-1, -1, -1]
    linIdx = r * c - ((candy - 1) % (r * c) + 1)
    box_label = (candy - 1) // (r * c) + 1
    row = linIdx // c
    col = linIdx % c
    return [box_label, row, col]

def get_candy_position(n, r, c, candy):
    if candy <= n:
        return [-1, -1, -1]
    linIdx = r * c - ((candy - 1) % (r * c) + 1)

    row = linIdx // c
    col = linIdx % c
    return [box_label, row, col]
